PARTICIPACAO-EM-PROJETO.NOME-ORGAO: Groupe Conception Et Commande Des Systèmes de Production
PARTICIPACAO-EM-PROJETO.NOME-UNIDADE: Equipe Maintenance Et Sûreté de Fonctionnement

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Projeto PROTEUS: An European ITEA project on a generic platform for e-maintenance
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO:
The main operational objective of PROTEUS was to improve the efficiency of industrial maintenance by bringing expertise directly to the user site via the Internet. Its main scientific objective was to promote a de-facto form of standardisation through extensive use of new data structuring (XML), application integration techniques and Internet-related technologies. Its economic goals were both to reduce the maintenance process costs (time-to-diagnosis and duration of intervention) and to prevent failures by early monitoring of field equipment (conditions-based predictive maintenance).
Este projeto europeu é dirigido pela sociedade Cegelec e agrupa empresas francesas, alemãs e belgas. Este recebeu financiamento de três governos.
Consórcio francês : Cegelec, Schneider Electric, Arc Informatique, TIL Technologies, Pertinence, LORIA, LAB - LIFC.
Consórcio alemão : Cegelec AKN Eisenbahn AG, IFAK, Fraunhofer IML (Cottbus).
Consórcio belga : Vartec, Barco.

FINANCIADOR-DO-PROJETO.NOME-INSTITUICAO: Laboratoire Lorrain de Recherche en Informatique et ses Applications

PRODUCAO-CT-DO-PROJETO.TITULO-DA-PRODUCAO-CT: On the use of artificial intelligence for prognosis and diagnosis in the PROTEUS e-maintenance platform.
PRODUCAO-CT-DO-PROJETO.TIPO-PRODUCAO-CT: Trabalho publicado em anais de eventos(Completo)

ENSINO.NOME-CURSO: Licence Pro Em Gestão da Produção Industrial
Licence Pro Em Gestão da Produção Industrial

PESQUISA-E-DESENVOLVIMENTO.NOME-ORGAO: Divisão de Engenharia Eletrônica, Departamento de Sistemas e Controle.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: Diagnosis methods using artificial intelligence. Application of Fuzzy Petri Nets and Neuro-Fuzzy Systems

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: Third Conference on Management and Control of Production and Logistics

SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-1: Outras Atividades de Assessoria e Consultoria Às Empresas

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: In this paper an overview of the most important artificial intelligence diagnosis tools is given. For each tool, we focus on diagnosis principles and on its advantages and disadvantages. That allows us to extract four important points that a diagnosis tool should fulfilled. Using these results, we propose a tool based on fuzzy Petri nets and a tool based on neuro-fuzzy systems, which allow to make a diagnosis using a model easy to build and that take into account the uncertainties of maintenance knowledges. These tools provide abductive approaches of fault propagations system with an efficient localization and a characterization of the fault origin. At the end, we apply our tools on a comparative example of a flexible system diagnosis.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: Diagnosis aid system using a neuro-fuzzy approach

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: Advances in Maintenance and Modeling, Simulation and Intelligent Monitoring of Degradation

SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-1: Outras Atividades de Assessoria e Consultoria Às Empresas

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: The complexity of real production systems implies more difficulties to make an efficient fault diagnosis. We propose a new method that helps the operator to find the cause and the origin of a fault. To obtain a diagnosis aid system that is both reactive and easy to configure, we define a set of artificial intelligence tools using neuro-fuzzy techniques. The interest of these techniques is to combine the ability to learn of neural networks and the natural language formalism of the fuzzy logic.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: An UML modelling of a neuro-fuzzy monitoring system

SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-1: Outras Atividades de Assessoria e Consultoria Às Empresas

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: The complexity of real production systems implies more difficulties to make an efficient monitoring and especially fault diagnosis. We propose a new method supporting the operator to find the cause and the origin of a fault. To obtain a diagnosis aid system that is both reactive and easy to configure, we define a set of artificial intelligence tools using neuro-fuzzy techniques. The interest of these techniques is to combine the neural networks learning capabilities and the natural language formalism modelling capabilities of the fuzzy logic. Our approach follows the UML approach with the description of the seven use cases of our method.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: On the use of artificial intelligence for prognosis and diagnosis in the PROTEUS e-maintenance platform.

SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-1: Outras Atividades de Assessoria e Consultoria Às Empresas

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: The PROTEUS project has identified several maintenance tasks and functionalities where Artificial Intelligence tools or methods could bring many benefits. In this paper, we focus on the diagnosis and prognosis of faulty states in equipments. We show how the generic PROTEUS AI Web Service can be instantiated with different AI tools to do diagnosis or prognosis. Thanks to the PROTEUS architecture, these services can work with various data and knowledge sources (like FMECA, SCADA, CMMS, ERP) enabling the use of both maintenance and production data. The characteristics of these Web Services are then analyzed so as to specify the features of a Meta-Tool that, for a given diagnosis or prognosis task, would help decide which tools are best suited. This Meta-Tool itself could be built as an instance of the generic PROTEUS AI Web Service .

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: Correspondência Densa para Sistemas de Visão Estereoscópica para Robótica Móvel
Desenvolvimento de uma Biblioteca para Sistemas de Visão Estereoscópica para robótica móvel

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Utilisation des réseaux de neurones temporels pour le pronostic et la surveillance dynamique.

DETALHAMENTO-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-PERIODICO-OU-REVISTA: Revue Des Sciences Et Technologie de l Information

SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-1: Outras Atividades de Assessoria e Consultoria Às Empresas

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: This article gives a state of the art of temporal neural networks and a comparison of three recurrent neural network which are most representative for applications of dynamic monitoring and prognosis. The criteria of selection of these networks are at two levels: a temporal criterion (internal or external representation of time) and an architectural criterion (local or global solution of the answer). Following the application of these criteria, three recurrent networks seem relevant: the RRBF, the R2BF and the DGNN. Tests using a benchmark dynamic monitoring and a benchmark of prognosis enable us to evaluate the performances of the three temporal networks in term of computing and processing capacity time.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: A neuro-fuzzy monitoring system. Application to flexible production systems.

SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-1: Outras Atividades de Assessoria e Consultoria Às Empresas

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: The multiple reconfiguration and the complexity of the modern production system lead to design intelligent monitoring aid systems. Accordingly, the use of neuro-fuzzy technics seems very promising. In this paper, we propose a new monitoring aid system composed by a dynamic neural network detection tool and a neuro-fuzzy diagnosis tool. Learning capabilities due to the neural structure permit us to update the monitoring aid system. The neuro-fuzzy network provides an abductive diagnosis. Moreover it takes into account the uncertainties on the maintenance knowledge by giving a fuzzy characterization of each cause. At the end, we illustrate the industrial usefulness of the proposed dynamic neuro-fuzzy monitoring system trough a flexible production system monitoring application.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO-TECNICO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO-TECNICO: Conception et prototypage d un système de surveillance dynamique embarqué et d aide au diagnostic d un centre d usinage à grande vitesse.
